name: Rebellion Stryker
storyline: In a future where corrupt politicians reign supreme and tyranny grips the cities with an iron fist, a beacon of hope emerges! Enter the Strykers, a fearless band of mercenaries struggling to pay the bills! Tasked by an enigmatic benefactor, Raimu and Rale Guhn embark on a mission to topple the oppressors and restore justice to the people, determined to unravel the mysteries shrouding their elusive client! Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled journey through the shadows of power and intrigue!
summary: Gun your way through this cyberpunk Run-n-Gun with never-before-seen hand-drawn graphics! Pick between two characters and even play co-op in this arcade title!
